fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Throw five thorns at a target.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The thorns will be distributed randomly among the target and their neighbors up to three houses away. Houses do not include dead players. Players can get multiple thorns.
- Each thorn reduces the targetâ€™s defense (including temporary) by one stage for the night. Being reduced below vulnerable will kill them. Monkeys cannot go below Vulnerable.
-You can only pick one upgrade, outlined in bold.
**Avatar of Wrath** (Requirement: Directly kill two players.)
- Thorns are now distributed among the target and their direct living neighbors.
- If you are roleblocked/jailed, you will kill the roleblocker/jailor and destroy their will unless you are executed.
- If you kill two people as AoW, you also deal a Powerful attack to your target after the thorns take effect.
**Spirit of the Forest** (Requirement: Give three thorns to the same person throughout the game without them dying.)

fields.name: Abilities (cont.):
fields.value:
- Each night, you will additionally automatically roleblock and deal a Powerful attack to the non-Monkey that receives the most visitors.
- All non-killing and non-Monkey visits on Monkeys will fail.
- After six abilities fail because of your attribute, you will attack and destroy the will of anyone that visits a Monkey.
